AzureBlade: The foes are many, I am afraid. The battle we had was with 
the Decepticons, and someone from the Infecticons intervened. I also 
felt a maximal being reprogrammed as a predacon at about the same 
time. I think we and the Predacons hold a non-agression pact or 
something... And Pax Cybertronia seems very far, we are on prehistoric 
Earth.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Starcasm6@a... wrote:
> OOC: sorry about the delay
> ghost: a battle? with who?
> goth: I had always thought that the Pax Cybertronia was sacrosanct 
as far as 
> earth went! what's the deal here? who are the hostiles?
>  ghost and goth begin to notice small bits of technology in 
scattered areas. 
> trees are covered in solar panels, wires are running out of the 
ground. the 
> city is close, presumably.
